nodes.text: Sunder Ghettz was a male Human slave of Darth Baras, a Sith Lord of the reconstituted Sith Empire. During the Cold War he was sent to greet Baras' new apprentice when the latter arrived on the Imperial capital of Dromund Kaas.
When the apprentice of Darth Baras arrived on Dromund Kaas, he was welcomed by Sunder Ghettz who was waiting for him there as his master's orders.
After Ghettz told the Warrior about Dromund Kaas, the Sith killed him, finding him annoying.
When the player encounters Sunder Ghettz in conversation, they have the choice of either killing him or letting him live.
